about_the_game:
The boldest Tag Team in AEW history, Anthony Bowens and Max Caster of The Acclaimed, PLUS the brand new Dynamite themed arena kick off AEW: Fight Forever’s Season 2 DLC series.

This content is part of the season pass 2 which includes:
3 more talents added to the roster, 37 brandnew move-sets, 60 new attire parts for your wrestler, the Dynamite arena, and a new single-player mode.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood could be visible in barbed wire matches and if using certain weapons. You can turn off blood effects at anytime in the options menu!

detailed_description:
This DLC is included here

AEW: Fight Forever - Season Pass 2


About the Game

The boldest Tag Team in AEW history, Anthony Bowens and Max Caster of The Acclaimed, PLUS the brand new Dynamite themed arena kick off AEW: Fight Forever’s Season 2 DLC series.

This content is part of the season pass 2 which includes:
3 more talents added to the roster, 37 brandnew move-sets, 60 new attire parts for your wrestler, the Dynamite arena, and a new single-player mode.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3550 / AMD FX 8150 (AVX - Compatible processor)
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 480 / Intel® Arc™ A380 Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: At least 6 GB Video Memory
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790 / AMD FX 8350 (AVX - Compatible processor)
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 / Radeon RX 580 / Intel® Arc™ A770 Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: At least 6 GB Video Memory
